Class Team

java.lang.Object
Team
All Implemented Interfaces:
teamInterface
public class Team extends Object implements teamInterface
The Team class represents a sports team.

  • Constructor Details

    • Team

      public Team(Player[] players)
      Constructs a Team object with an array of players.
      Parameters:
      players - The array of Player objects representing the players in the team.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the players array is null.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a player to the team.
      Specified by:
      addPlayer in interface teamInterface
      Parameters:
      player - The Player object representing the player to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the team already has the maximum number of players or if the player's skill level is not within the valid range.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(Player player)
      Removes a player from the team.
      Specified by:
      removePlayer in interface teamInterface
      Parameters:
      player - The player to be removed from the team
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the team has less than 11 members or the player's skill level is not between 1 and 5 (inclusive)

    • replacePlayer

      public void replacePlayer(Player playerOnBench, Player playerOnGround)
      Replaces a player on the bench with a player on the ground in the team.
      Specified by:
      replacePlayer in interface teamInterface
      Parameters:
      playerOnBench - The player to be replaced on the bench.
      playerOnGround - The player to be replaced on the ground.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the players to be replaced do not exist in the team.
      IllegalArgumentException - if either player's skill level is not between 1 and 5 (inclusive).

    • selectLineUp

      public ArrayList<Player> selectLineUp(ArrayList<Player> playerArrayList)
      Selects the lineup of players based on preferred positions.
      Specified by:
      selectLineUp in interface teamInterface
      Parameters:
      playerArrayList - The ArrayList of Player objects representing the players to choose from.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Player objects representing the selected lineup.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if playerArrayList is null.

    • teamToString

      public String teamToString()
      Returns a string representation of the team.
      Specified by:
      teamToString in interface teamInterface
      Returns:
      The string representation of the team, including the team total view and details of each player.
